/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the sky.

In the distance, the iconic Great Wall of China can be seen, its imposing structure a testament to the city's rich history and cultural heritage. The image beautifully juxtaposes the modern cityscape with the ancient fortifications, creating a unique blend of the old and the new.
